Job Title: Python Developer
Location: Coimbatore - Onsite
Experience Required: 4–6 years
Employment Type: Full-time
 
Required Skills & Qualifications:
1. Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
2. 4–6 years of hands-on experience with Python development.
3. Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design patterns.
4. Proficiency with web frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, FastAPI).
5. Experience with RESTful APIs and third-party integrations.
6. Strong understanding of SQL/NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).
7. Familiarity with version control systems (Git).
8. Experience with unit testing & debugging.
9. Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, or cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) is a plus.
10. Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.

Good to Have:
1. Experience with asynchronous programming (AsyncIO, Celery, etc.).
2. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
3. Knowledge of front-end technologies (React/Angular/Vue) for integration purposes.
4. Exposure to data processing frameworks (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Spark)

Kindly share your updated resume to hire-india@onedatasoftware.com

We’re Hiring: Lead Python Developer!

📍 Location: PAN India | 💼 Experience: 6+ Years | ⏳ NP: Immediate – 30 Days | 💰 CTC: Up to 18 LPA

We’re looking for a Lead Python Developer to design, build, and scale modern applications while mentoring a talented dev team. If you’re passionate about Python, cloud, and scalable architectures—this role is for you!

What You’ll Do:
1. Lead & mentor a Python dev team, ensuring best practices.
2. Architect, develop, and deploy secure & scalable apps.
3. Collaborate with Product, QA, DevOps, and Data teams.
4. Work on microservices, APIs, cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP), and containers (Docker/K8s).
5. Drive Agile practices & troubleshoot complex issues.

What We’re Looking For:
1. 6+ yrs in Python with Django/Flask/FastAPI.
2. Strong in OOPs, design patterns & microservices.
3. Hands-on with databases (SQL/NoSQL), APIs, Kafka/RabbitMQ.
4. Cloud & DevOps exposure (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes).
5. Great problem-solving & leadership skills.

👉 If this sounds like you, apply now and let’s build something amazing together! Send your resume to akshata.a@shework.in
